Package org.wmn4j.io.musicxml

Interface MusicXmlWriter

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable, ScoreWriter
public interface MusicXmlWriter extends ScoreWriter
Represents a writer for MusicXML files. The default MusicXML version for output is currently 4.0. Only part-wise scores are currently supported.

Implementations of this interface are not guaranteed to be thread-safe.

  • Method Details

    • writerFor

      static MusicXmlWriter writerFor(Score score, Path path, boolean compress, boolean minify)
      Returns an instance of a writer for the given Score and path.

      The MusicXML output can be minified and compressed for very compact output. However, some incorrectly implemented MusicXML parsers may depend on even insignificant whitespace so minified MusicXML files might not work with all software.

      Parameters:
      score - the score for which the writer is created
      path - the path to which the MusicXML file is written
      compress - set true to write compressed MusicXML, otherwise writes uncompressed
      minify - set true to produce minified MusicXML with no unnecessary whitespace
      Returns:
      an instance of a writer for the given Score
